BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.Testbench.assert
BlackBox.type:
assert

     , ShowX a                             -- ARG[1]
     )
  => Clock dom                             -- ARG[2]
  -> Reset dom                             -- ARG[3]
  -> String                                -- ARG[4]
  -> Signal dom a                          -- Checked value  (ARG[5])
  -> Signal dom a                          -- Expected value (ARG[6])
  -> Signal dom b                          -- Return valued  (ARG[7])
  -> Signal dom b
